metadata.title: Antigravity Skills - Convert Claude Skills to Open Format | AI Coding Skills
metadata.description: Antigravity Skills converts Claude Skills to open format compatible with Cursor, Antigravity, Claude Code, and Amp. Free online converter for vibe coding practitioners.
metadata.keywords: antigravity skills, claude skills converter, ai coding skills, vibe coding, cursor skills, Antigravity skills, claude code, prompt engineering, ai automation
